description: This cottage pie is lighter than the original with a bright and slightly sweet carrot and swede mash on top.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Egg free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Carrot & Swede Mash Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and finely chopped
0.8 cup beef stock, made with one stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan on a medium high heat, drizzle the oil and cook the onion for 5 minutes until softened. Add the garlic and cook for a minute. Increase the heat to high, add the mince, break up with a spoon and cook for 5-7 minutes until nicely browned.
Stir in the tomato puree and herbs, mix well to coat and pour over the beef stock. Bring to the boil and simmer for 15 minutes until reduced and thickened.
Place the carrots and swede in a large saucepan, cover with water and boil for 10-12 minutes until soft. Drain and mash with the butter.
Pour the mince into a casserole dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 20 minutes until golden and bubbling.
